Basic TouchList

This is an example of the most basic touchlist.

  • Item 1

  • Item 2

  • Item 3

     
<%-- JSP --%>
<div class="doc-box">
    <ul class="touchList">
        <li:item label="Item 1" action="url" />
        <li:item label="Item 2" action="url" />
        <li:item label="Item 3" action="url" />
    </ul>
</div>

<!-- HTML -->
<div class="doc-box">
    <ul class="touchList">
        <li class="touchList-item">
            <a href="url" class="ffbox ffbox--touchList-item">
                <div class="ffbox-flex">
                    <h4 class="touchList-label">Item 1</h4>
                </div>
            </a>
        </li>
        <li class="touchList-item">
            <a href="url" class="ffbox ffbox--touchList-item">
                <div class="ffbox-flex">
                    <h4 class="touchList-label">Item 2</h4>
                </div>
            </a>
        </li>
        <li class="touchList-item">
            <a href="url" class="ffbox ffbox--touchList-item">
                <div class="ffbox-flex">
                    <h4 class="touchList-label">Item 3</h4>
                </div>
            </a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>

Segmented Touch List

    Included file 'mobile/touchlist/segmented_example.md' not found in _includes directory
  • Windows Phones
    • LG Quantum (7.5)
    • Nokia Lumia 620 (8)
  • iOS Devices
    • iPhone 3G (4.1.3)
    • iPhone 3GS (6.1.3)
    • iPhone 4 (6.1.4)
    • iPhone 4S (6.1.3)
    • iPhone 5 (6.1.4)
    • iPod Touch 5 (7.0) 
<!-- HTML -->
<li class="touchList-segment">
    <h5 class="touchList-segment-header">
        Android Phones
    </h5>
    <ul class="touchList-segment-content">
        <li class="touchList-item">
            <div class="ffbox ffbox--touchList-item">
                <div class="ffbox-flex">
                    Motorola Droid X (2.3)
                </div>
            </div>
        </li>

                    Samsung Galaxy S (4.0)
                </div>
            </div>
        </li>

            <div class="ffbox ffbox--touchList-item">
